underlying_goal: Fix a bug where switching browser tabs resets/wipes form pages, create a Linear issue for it, implement the fix, and additionally persist form state across page refreshes
brief_summary: User reported a bug where switching browser tabs wiped form state; Claude investigated the root cause, created a Linear issue, fixed the tab-switch bug across 3 files, added sessionStorage persistence for form data across refreshes, committed and pushed all changes, and updated the Linear issue to done.
